## Source: ossf-package-analysis (b444962332036ed34a6122ae3f4595e0b05e8a2d1391aa9f7a1b06b9ab639114)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'numpy-req' @ 12.17.3 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
